name: Soccer City - Club Manager
description:
you can have your own soccer club with a team of players you always loved.

You are the manager.

Build your team, adjust team tactics, adjust formations and compete with other clubs. . .

*** The match is completely simulated to be a real coaching experience, so be careful about the players, formations and team tactics in the game. If you win, you earn money from sponsors and fans.

Features:

- Build your soccer team with the best players
- Form an alliance with friends
- Public & alliance online chat inside the game
- Compete with other users' teams in fully simulated football matches
- buy players in transfer market
- play online in different soccer leagues and try to win prizes
- sell players on the bench
- Coaching and determining team formations, tactics, etc. before the start of the match
- manage a ticket office, sports equipment store, fast food, etc. next to the stadium
- Train players to increase their power in various fields
- Recover players to regain energy lost during matches
- Upgrade existing buildings in the city
- Make Money From Stadium Revenue Businesses
- Choose a sponsor to financially support your club
- Earn money through sponsorship ads and contracts with FIFA at your stadium
- Accurate and intelligent transfer system with search capability available between players
